snippet: Christine C. Quinn now seeks to win over an unsettled electorate that is increasingly concerned about the economic polarization that has grown up during Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s tenure.
abstract: City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn, seeking to win over an unsettled electorate that is increasingly concerned about the economic polarization that has grown during the tenure of Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, focuses on affordable housing and a middle-class tax break in her State of the City address.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn now seeks to win over an unsettled electorate that is increasingly concerned about the economic polarization that has grown up during Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s tenure.

headline.seo: With Eye on Mayor’s Office, Quinn Casts Herself as a Champion of Economic Opportunity
headline.main: With Eye on Mayor’s Office, Quinn Turns Her Attention to Income Inequality
headline.print_headline: With Eye on Mayor’s Office, Quinn Turns Her Attention to Income Inequality
